TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Pick extends System.Activities.NativeActivity
Public NotInheritable Class Pick Inherits NativeActivity
public ref class Pick sealed : System::Activities::NativeActivity

summary.span: 提供事件架構控制流程模型。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個活動的行為類似於 ，因為它只會執行多個活動中的其中一個來回應事件。This activity behaves similarly to in that it executes only one of several activities in response to events. 選擇要執行的動作是由從一組事件中選擇的事件所定義。The action chosen to be executed is defined by an event, chosen from a set of events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 活動。The following code sample demonstrates creating a activity. 這個範例取自[使用 Pick 活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md)範例。This example is from the [Using the Pick Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_Pick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_pick/cs/program.cs#1)]

summary.span: 物件的集合， 活動可能會根據傳入事件執行其中一個物件。

span.span: The collection of objects that the activity potentially executes one of, based on incoming events.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 活動的 Branches 屬性。The following code sample demonstrates setting the Branches property of a activity. 這個範例取自[使用 Pick 活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md)範例。This example is from the [Using the Pick Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-pick-activity.md) sample.
